Package dmatrix

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • dmatrix.Matrix

  • public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
    A matrix with values of type short.

      • getDistanceTry

        public java.lang.Short getDistanceTry(Vertex v0,
                                      Vertex v1)

        Returns:
        the distance or null

      • getNJMatrix

        public DMatrix getNJMatrix(Configuration config)
        Compute the NJ matrix from this matrix. The NJ algorithm can be either Java implementation or it can use an external "Clearcut" library, depending on the configuration.

      • getNJTree

        public NJVertex getNJTree(Configuration config)
        Compute the NJ matrix from this matrix. The NJ algorithm can be either Java implementation or it can use an external "Clearcut" library, depending on the configuration.
